speech: Brown Spot chawal ke patton aur daanay par hone wali ek aam bimari hai.
Is bimari ke symptoms patton par brown ya black dhabbay hain jo dheere dheere barhte hain.
Yeh bimari adhik nami, barish, ya nutrient deficiency ki wajah se hoti hai.
Iska ilaj: Proper fertilizer ka istemal karein, nitrogen ka level balance rakhein aur fungicides ka spray karein.
Agar symptoms barh rahe hain, apne ilaqe ke expert se mashwara zaroor karein.

data.text: Brown spot chawal ke patton par kaise hota hai?
Mujhe chawal ke patton par brown dhabbay nazar aa rahe hain, kya karein?
Brown spot ka ilaj kya hai?
Brown spot chawal ki yield par kya asar dalta hai?
Yeh bimari kis mausam mein zyada hoti hai?
